fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Digital Single Market, TTIP, EU-US Privacy Shield, ePrivacy & NIS directives, cross border data flows
organisation_name: American Chamber of Commerce in Spain (AmChamSpain)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: AmChamSpain’s main aim is to work to improve the Spanish economy’s competitiveness, productivity and internationalization, attract and stimulate investment and commerce between the U.S. and Spain, and promote the exchange of science and technology between the two countries.
